snippet: The San Diego Padres acquired the two-time All-Star outfielder Carlos Quentin from the Chicago White Sox on Saturday in an attempt to bolster their anemic offense.
abstract: San Diego Padres acquire the two-time All-Star outfielder Carlos Quentin from Chicago White Sox in an attempt to bolster their anemic offense.
lead_paragraph: The San Diego Padres acquired the two-time All-Star outfielder Carlos Quentin from the Chicago White Sox on Saturday in an attempt to bolster their anemic offense.

headline.seo: Padres Get Quentin From the White Sox
